name: wrap-and-stake-weth-usdc
description: Wrap ETH to WETH, swap to USDC, and stake USDC on Aave.

operations: Wrap 1 ETH to WETH using function deposit() of IWETH interface [value: 1 ether]

groups.description: Swap 1 WETH to USDC using Uniswap V3 Router
operations: Approve 1 WETH for SwapRouter02 using function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) of IERC20 interface [spender: 0x68b3465833fb72A70ecDF485E0e4C7bD8665Fc45, amount: 1 ether]

Swap 1 WETH for USDC using function exactInputSingle(ExactInputSingleParams memory params) of ISwapRouter02 interface [params: tokenIn=0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2, tokenOut=0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48, fee=3000, recipient=msg.sender, amountIn=1 ether, amountOutMinimum=0, sqrtPriceLimitX96=0]

groups.description: Deposit USDC into Aave V3 Pool to receive aUSDC
operations: Get USDC balance using function balanceOf(address account) of IERC20 interface [account: msg.sender] and store the result in variable usdcAmount
Approve USDC for Aave Pool using function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) of IERC20 interface [spender: 0x87870Bca3F3fD6335C3F4ce8392D69350B4fA4E2, amount: usdcAmount]

Deposit USDC into Aave using function supply(address asset, uint256 amount, address onBehalfOf, uint16 referralCode) of IPool interface [asset: 0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48, amount: usdcAmount, onBehalfOf: msg.sender, referralCode: 0]
